pages.text: Main material to craft gold golem parts. Gold golem parts feature health regeneration, while having very low stats for all attributes.$(br2)It is recommended for body or legs if you want regeneration, and the other body or legs component should be some other material to get decent health for the golem.
Use JEI (press R) to check part stats of each part made of this material.
